key_risks: Regulatory challenges, including failed acquisition of Arm Ltd. and antitrust scrutiny for Run:ai acquisition
Supply chain vulnerabilities due to reliance on third-party manufacturers like TSMC
Intense competition from AMD, Intel, and emerging players in AI and GPU markets
controversies: Termination of $40 billion Arm Ltd. acquisition due to regulatory hurdles
Antitrust scrutiny for $700 million Run:ai acquisition
environmental_issues: Pressure to set more ambitious climate targets despite sustainability initiatives
governance_issues: Execution risks in potential alliances, such as with Intel
